lead_paragraph: Rex Grossman has managed to put up numbers on par with some Super Bowl legends, and yet is still regarded by some as the reason that the Bears will not win it all against Peyton Manning and the Colts.
snippet: Rex Grossman has managed to put up numbers on par with some Super Bowl legends, and yet is still regarded by some as the reason that the Bears will not win it all against Peyton Manning and the Colts.
